700752f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Bay Street
700752f-a.text:
City Island Avenue (City Island), east side, af the head of
Bay Street. The empty lot is for sale.
July 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
700752f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Bay Street, Bronx, NY

700749f-a.title: Bronx: City Island Avenue - Bay Street
700749f-a.text:
319 to 329 City IIsland Avenue (City Island), adjoining and at the S. W. corner of Bay Street. The long 2-story frame building bears Nos. 321 to 329. In the center of the house, at No. 325, is the City Island Branch of the New York Public Library (note small sign above entrance), and at 329, at the corner where the lTnited States flag is seen, is the City Island station
of the United States Post Office.
July 6, 1928
P. L. Sperr
700749f-a.folder: City Island Avenue & Bay Street, Bronx, NY
